page.title: 16Gymkhana-Grove Park,Malpas
page.content: I have owned Trigger,a 14 year old{ {gelding,}for about a year.I keep him at Pentwyn Farm,Bettws and spend hours with him every evening.We practise going in and out of sticks in the ground and practise jumping over low fences. On Saturday I took my pony to compete at the{gymkhana}at Grove Park,Malpas run by Magor and District Riding Club. The events started at 10.30a.m.and finished at 5.30p.m.There were riders from the Malpas and Bettws area as well as competitors from Magor.I entered 12{races}and won{rosettes}in 6 of them.I also won the trophy for being the best in some races. There were about 60{spectators}but there is not much room to watch at Grove Park which is near the motorway and river. Rachel Iles
